text: Kikoriki, known in the United States as Gogoriki and in Russia as Smeshariki () is a Russian animated television series made up of 209 episodes of 6 minutes and 30 seconds each, aimed at children of 3 to 8 years. The first episode premiered in Russia on May 17, 2004. The series is aired in 60 countries, is translated to 15 languages. ==References== Category:Animated television series
title: Kikoriki
